document_data.name: Zeld Mizzrym
document_data.mainbody: '''Zeld Mizzrym''' was a [[drow]] priestess of [[House Mizzrym]] in [[Menzoberranzan]].
document_data.History: Around [[1361 DR]], Zeld was a Mizzrym priestess and an instructor at [[Arach-Tinilith]]. She was in charge of teaching first-year students and was the first person to notice the rivalry between [[Shakti Hunzrin]] and [[Liriel Baenre]].
